title: Road to the World Championships Interview Series: AoS Golden Ticket Winner McKenzie Ewing

description: In Hammer of Math we look at statistics and probability in Warhammer. This week, we’re looking at the lineup for the World Championships of Warhammer happening this week and trying to predict a winner! Welcome back reader, to the second article in our ongoing coverage of the World Championships of Warhammer from a statistics perspective. […]
title: Hammer of Math – Predicting the World Championships of Warhammer

description: There’s never been a better time to dive into historicals miniature gaming. We’re in a massive renaissance of kits and manufacturers, plastic sprues, 3D printing, home designs and more multi-part posable models than we’ve ever had before. It seems like every month brings us a fantastic new historicals kit in periods and scales that have […]
title: Goonhammer Historicals: Are We Done with Metal Miniatures?

description: We've made some big updates to Administratum, with support for two new factions!
title: Administratum Updates: Custodes, Genestealer Cults, and Chaos Space Marines

description: Continuing along with our interviews pre-Worlds this year I sit down with Jack, a relative newcomer to the AoS scene but also a local, friend, and rival (if you ask him anyway) of mine. He got back into AoS a couple years ago and we’ve been playing a couple times a month in that time. […]
title: Road to the World Championships Interview Series: AoS Golden Ticket Winner Jack Higgs
